lore: Chimeras do need to sleep, and they have the ability to do so for long periods of time, which allows them to stay awake for many, many days.\n\nUndying Chimeras are quite reserved and do not usually participate in conversations, but when they do it is always in a yelling voice, as they are simply incapable of speaking in a lower volume. Fortunately for them, this does not bother other Chimeras, and it is also not why these creatures are so quiet.
menagerieDialog: (Such a horrifying yet fascinating creature... you don't want to look, but you can't seem to tear your gaze away from it.)
(This creature is clearly the product of a sick and twisted mind.)
(This creature inspires you to think about what would happen if Torun fused himself with a Dumpling.)
(Despite its horrifying appearance, this creature's steadfast loyalty to you and your kingdom is unquestionable.)
name: Undying Chimera
